O

onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.MainActivity
This function defines all the event listeners for the icons in the main layout of the application.
onClickRedo() - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.CustomViewForDrawing
This function is called when the user selects the redo command from the application.
onClickUndo() - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.CustomViewForDrawing
This function is called when the user selects the undo command from the application.
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.MainActivity
This method is called to initialize the options menu in the action bar.
onGesturePerformed(GestureOverlayView, Gesture) - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.MainActivity
This method is called when a gesture is input from the gesture view.
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.MainActivity
This method is called when an item is selected from the options menu in the actions bar.
onTouchEvent(MotionEvent) - Method in class com.example.paintapplication.CustomViewForDrawing
This method acts as an event listener when a touch event is detected on the device.
